law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1425, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 40, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 273, sec. 49, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 28, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 62, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 451, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 6, effective February 26, 1982; and ch. 320, sec. 38, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 195, sec. 3, effective January 1, 1975. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 32, sec. 27, effective June 18, 1970.
